channel.title: Mutes,bans,and teles
channel.description: people on my server and getting very annoying and sumtimes i want to mute/ban them but i dont have the codes for either?so what are they?and i have the ::alltome command but sometimes i just wanna tele 1 or to ppl so could some1 tell me the ::xteletome (name) code

item.title: Mutes,bans,and teles
item.dc:creator: @pl0x_pk pl0x pk
item.description:
@pl0x_pk wrote:

whats that the xteletome?and if so where do i add it?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 29, 2007, 09:16:56 AM[/size][hr]all i need now is the muting code plz

Read full topic

item.title: Mutes,bans,and teles
item.dc:creator: @i_own_u1 i_own__u
item.description:
@i_own_u1 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("xteletome") && playerRights >= 1) { try{ String otherPName = command.substring(10); int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName); if(otherPIndex != -1) { client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.teleportToX = absX; p.teleportToY = absY; p.heightLevel = heightLevel; p.updateRequired = true; p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; p.sendMessage("You have been teleported to "+playerName); } else { sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to you.."); } }

Now gimme the all teletome code

Read full topic
